title: Construction cost per kilometer of high-speed line in France 2014
yAxis: Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros
summary: This is a bar chart representing High-speed Line in the x axis and Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in the y axis.
The Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros is highest at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and lowest at High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
The highest High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean has 14.2 more Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros than the lowest High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing High-speed Line in the x axis and Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in the y axis.
The Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros is appeared to be the highest at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and lowest at High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing High-speed Line in the x axis and Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in the y axis.
The Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros is highest at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and lowest at High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
The highest High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean has 14.2 more Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros than the lowest High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros for 8 number of High-speed Lines.
The Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros is highest at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and lowest at High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
There is a difference of 14.2 between the maximum High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and minimum High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.

High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean is higher than any other High-speed Lines with value 19.7, followed by LGV Rhine-Rhone, and LGV East. Down to High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon with the lowest value 5.5.
The High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon tends to be 1.45 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all High-speed Lines, we get total 108.5.
